item.title: Netlify
item.dc:creator: Chris Gargiulo
item.description:
Netlify (netlify.com) is a free “serverless” website hosting service that offers a wide range of powerful services that make site deployment super easy and static sites super powerful. Known for the term Jamstack, a modern way to build lightning-fast websites and web apps, Netlify prioritizes performance via its CDN network and improves the developer experience by offering …

Netlify Read More »
item.content:encoded: Netlify (netlify.com) is a free “serverless” website hosting service that offers a wide range of powerful services that make site deployment super easy and static sites super powerful. Known for the term Jamstack, a modern way to build lightning-fast websites and web apps, Netlify prioritizes performance via its CDN network and improves the developer experience by offering an easy workflow that connects your GitHub repositories of source code to your production-built websites.
